com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.exoplayerextensions

Class DefaultRendererBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.exoplayerextensions.DefaultRendererBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExoplayerWrapper.RendererBuilder

    public class DefaultRendererBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExoplayerWrapper.RendererBuilder
    A ExoplayerWrapper.RendererBuilder for streams that can be read using android.media.MediaExtractor.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ALLOWED_JOINING_TIME_MS
      The maximum duration in milliseconds for which this video renderer can attempt to seamlessly join an ongoing playback.
      private Context context
      The context (ex android.app.Activity) in which this ExoplayerWrapper.RendererBuilder was created.
      static int MAX_DROPPED_FRAME_COUNT_TO_NOTIFY
      The maximum number of frames that can be dropped between invocations of onDroppedFrames(int, long).
      private Uri uri
      The URL of the video that this ExoplayerWrapper.RendererBuilder will build.
